item.title: Complaint received about flooding, 6th April
item.description:
Footpath - Milne Walk. Not current, but report received about flooding on this path making it very difficult for pupils accessing school gate and residents using front of their properties. Can this be investigated please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Dill Avenue, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Yet more rubbish fly tipped here., 6th April
item.description:
At some point between 4:00pm on Saturday and 9:00am Sunday morning yet more rubbish has been dumped on the corner of Pates Avenue & Alstone Lane. This time it appears to be several black plastic bags, a rolled up mattress and a large TV box .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Alstone Lane, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstruction caused by fence, 6th April
item.description:
On Footpath KDO32 there is a fenced enclosure (possibly for breeding pheasants) which obstructs the path as shown on both the OS map and definitive maps which forces walkers to take a significant detour.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
